snippet: “ ‘Creative’ is not a department at our agency,” says Christine Fruechte of Colle + McVoy in Minneapolis, because it expects creativity “from everyone within the organization.”
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Colle & McVoy president and chief executive Christine Fruechte discussing her management style.
lead_paragraph: “ ‘Creative’ is not a department at our agency,” says Christine Fruechte of Colle + McVoy in Minneapolis, because it expects creativity “from everyone within the organization.”

headline.print_headline: Where Ideas Are Always on the Wall
headline.seo: Christine Fruechte, on Her Ad Agency’s Creativity
headline.main: Where Ideas Are Always on the Wall
